actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Research.
Subcommittee on Agricultural Research. Hearings held.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Research and General Legislation

official_title: A bill to establish a Soybean Research Institute for the purpose of coordinating and conducting research programs, encouraging soybean exports, and providing the leadership for a national soybean policy.

summary.text: Establishes a Soybean Research Institute to coordinate and conduct research programs, encourage soybean exports, and provide for a national soybean policy.

titles.title: A bill to establish a Soybean Research Institute for the purpose of coordinating and conducting research programs, encouraging soybean exports, and providing the leadership for a national soybean policy.
